channeldata.description: Squash provides a single API to access many compression libraries, allowing applications a great deal of flexibility in choosing compression algorithms, including the option to pass that choice along to the user.
channeldata.summary: Functions for color-based visualization of multivariate data, i.e. colorgrams or heatmaps.  Lower-level functions  map numeric values to colors, display a matrix as an array of colors, and draw color keys.  Higher-level plotting functions generate a bivariate histogram, a dendrogram aligned with a color-coded matrix, a triangular distance matrix, and more.
